heroSubtitle: Books are our strength, the foundation of our future!
news_1: The staff of the Tuproqqal'a District Information Library Center organized a spiritual and educational event on the theme "A reading mother is the educator of an educated generation."
news_2: The staff of the Tuproqqal'a District Information Library Center organized a book exhibition at the 'Nilufar' camp on the theme "The book is a source of knowledge, a student's friend."
news_3: The staff of the Tuproqqal’a District Information Library Center organized a book exhibition at the 'Nilufar' camp on the theme “The book is a source of knowledge, a student’s companion.
news_4: The staff of the Tuproqqal’a District Information Library Center held a book exhibition at the 'Nilufar' camp on the theme “The book is a source of knowledge, a student’s friend.
